content.summary: Software Tester with 2 years of experience in software testing and quality assurance. Proficient in test case creation, execution, and defect tracking. Strong understanding of SDLC and Agile methodologies, dedicated to ensuring high-quality software and improving user experience.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Executed test plans for Health Cloud Salesforce
Collaborated with teams to enhance application quality and compliance
Managed and resolved over 50 testing issues while collaborating with offshore teams, improving issue resolution time by 30%

projects.title: Neuro modulation (NRO)
projects.objectives: To improve the patient journey in Salesforce Health Cloud for implanted pain relief devices.
contributions: Managed all stages, enhancing communication and data flow while ensuring compliance with healthcare regulations by working closely with sales representatives, physicians, and psychologists.
Led the Salesforce Health Cloud project to enhance patient care management for implanted pain relief devices
Developed and executed test cases based on business requirements, documenting results in JIRA and maintaining a bug report that tracked over 200+ issues

candidate_attributes_inferred.academic_performance: Completed Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science with 81.03% and Senior Secondary School with 60.04%
candidate_attributes_inferred.initiative_and_self_learning: Led the Salesforce Health Cloud project and developed comprehensive test cases based on functional specifications, user stories, and acceptance criteria
candidate_attributes_inferred.teamwork_or_leadership_traits: Managed all stages of Neuro modulation (NRO) project, collaborating with sales representatives, physicians, psychologists, and offshore teams
candidate_attributes_inferred.communication_clarity: Effectively trained new team members on project details and end-to-end functionality, reducing ramp-up time by 40% through clear communication
standout_traits: Attention to Detail: Demonstrated ability to identify even minor defects in software applications
Time Management: Ensures timely completion of testing activities while maintaining high-quality standards and processes, enhancing consistency and efficiency in testing
